>
[Snarling Badger](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2114)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You lose the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition

**Requirement** You have a [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) value of 1 or more.
</row>

</column>

---

This tarnished steel pendant is inlaid with the face of an enraged badger. When you Activate the talisman, it casts [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=149) on you. If you lose the wounded condition, the _heroism_ ends immediately.
